title: No Script Component in Head
content:
# No Script Component in Head

> Prevent usage of `next/script` in `next/head` component.

title: No Script Component in Head
content:
## [Why This Error Occurred](#why-this-error-occurred)

The `next/script` component should not be used in a `next/head` component.
preview: The `next/script` component should not be used in a `next/head` component.

title: No Script Component in Head
content:
## [Possible Ways to Fix It](#possible-ways-to-fix-it)

Move the `<Script />` component outside of `<Head>` instead.

**Before**

pages/index.js

```
import Script from 'next/script'
import Head from 'next/head'
 
export default function Index() {
  return (
    <Head>
      <title>Next.js</title>
      <Script src="/my-script.js" />
    </Head>
  )
}
```

**After**

pages/index.js

```
import Script from 'next/script'
import Head from 'next/head'
 
export default function Index() {
  return (
    <>
      <Head>
        <title>Next.js</title>
      </Head>
      <Script src="/my-script.js" />
    </>
  )
}
```
preview: Move the `<Script />` component outside of `<Head>` instead. **Before** pages/index.js [Code Block] **After** pages/index.js [Code Block]
